zone.line: Panthea
See where the child of Heaven with winged feet
Runs down the slanted sunlight of the dawn
Ione
Dear sister close thy plumes over thine eyes
Lest thou behold & die--they come they come
Blackening the birth of day with countless wings
And hollow underneath like death
1t Fury
Prometheus!
Immortal Titan!
3 Champion of Heaven's slaves!
Prometheus
He whom some dreadful voice invokes, is here,
Prometheus, the chained Titan.--Horrible forms
What & who are ye? never yet there came
Phantasms so foul thro monster-teeming Hell
From the all-miscreative brain of Jove;
Whilst I behold such execrable shapes {. .}
Methinks I grow like what I contemplate
And laugh & stare in loathsome sympathy
